title: WeatherSense – Geolocation Weather App
short: React app using OpenWeather + geolocation and custom theming.
description: A responsive weather application that detects the user's location, fetches real-time data from the OpenWeather API, and offers manual city selection with stored preferences.

title: Asteroid Miner – Procedural Space Shooter
short: Unity/C# top-down shooter with procedural map and object pooling.
description: Final year project featuring procedural asteroid belt generation, enemy spawning logic, and object pooling for performance.

title: AlgoTrader – C# Algorithmic Trading Simulator
short: Backtesting engine for trading strategies with data visualization.
description: C# application to backtest simple trading strategies on historical data and visualize performance.
